page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT - Lydham/More
page.content: There are{126 working age}people in the area, 43 of which are either self- employed or employed in jobs in the area such as {farming, forestry, light {and agricultural engineering, car {repairs, game keeping, landscape {gardening, and building. }There are 38 people who have to go out of the area to work, 14 are married women. The remaining 32 women are housewives who may work part time or do voluntary work in their husband's business by dealing with the paper work. There are {13 unemployed.}There is a total {population}of{187 }in Lydham and More. This consists of{113 working, 13 un- {employed, 30 retired, 24 receiving {full-time education and 7 pre-school {age.}There are no true class distinctions, however, people can be classed as middle/working classed people.
